name: Null Transmission
description:
Game submitted to the 2018 #ReverseJam for the theme "Transmit nothing".

The puzzles of the game are fully playable but the enemy AI as well as dialogue and backstory were not completed in time for the jam.

Story:

"A race of alien robots from another galaxy have sent a scout ship to the outer perimeter of your controlled space. Your mission is to take control of an enemy bot and sabotage their ships transmission systems to prevent them from sending a signal back to their mother ship."
